synthesis_conditions.temperature: 100 8C over 4 h then to 190 8C over 100 h, held at this temperature for 144 h, cooled to 90 8C over 400 h then to room temperature over 13 h
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The reaction mixture was frozen with liquid nitrogen and degassed three times. The ampoule was sealed under vacuum.

synthesis_conditions.temperature: 205 8C using the same heating rates and reaction times
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The reaction was carried out without pyridine. Any slight overheating results in decomposition of the ligand (decomp 208 8C); thus, the solvothermal synthesis in pyridine is more favorable.
